Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV4data10.name: data()
Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV4data10.abstract: Returns Data corresponding to the content object encoded with JSONEncoder.

Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAVAByxGxc.name: init(_:)
Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAVAByxGxc.abstract: Initialize from a model object that conforms to Codable.

Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAVAByxGSS.name: init(jsonString:)
Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAVAByxGSS.abstract: Initialize from a valid JSON formatted string. If the string is not valid, the exception will be thrown only when asking for content().

Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV3mapABy.name: map(data:)
Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV3mapABy.abstract: Do something with the JSON formatted as Data, and return a new TCJSON object.

Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV3mapABy.name: map(content:)
Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV3mapABy.abstract: Do something with the JSON formatted as Content, and return a new TCJSON object.

Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV7flatMa.name: flatMap(data:)
Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV7flatMa.abstract: Do something with the JSON formatted as Data, and return a new TCJSON object.

Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV7flatMa.name: flatMap(content:)
Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV7flatMa.abstract: Do something with the JSON formatted as Content, and return a new TCJSON object.

Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV7flatte.name: flatten()
Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV7flatte.abstract: If the current TCJSON contains another TCJSON object (like TCJSON<TCJSON<String>>), get rid of the outer object and returns the internal one (like (TCJSON<TCJSON<String>>) -> TCJSON<String>).

Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV5applyy.name: apply(data:)
Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV5applyy.abstract: Applies a function to the Data content of a TCJSON object.

Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV5applyy.name: apply(content:)
Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV5applyy.abstract: Applies a function to the Content of a TCJSON object.

Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV3zipABy.name: zip(x:y:closure:)
Structs/TCJSON.html#/s:6TCJSONAAV3zipABy.abstract: Takes the content of two TCJSON objects, applies a function to them and creates a new TCJSON object from the result.

Structs/TCJSONRequestEncoding.html#/s:6T.name: requestKey
Structs/TCJSONRequestEncoding.html#/s:6T.abstract: The key used in the request dictionary. To send directly a request with

Structs/TCJSONRequestEncoding.html#/s:6T.name: init(withRequestKey:)
Structs/TCJSONRequestEncoding.html#/s:6T.abstract: Initialize the encoding object, optionally providing a custom requestKey.

Structs/TCJSONRequestEncoding.html#/s:6T.name: encode(_:with:)
Structs/TCJSONRequestEncoding.html#/s:6T.abstract: Takes a POST method URLRequest and converts the model object in the parameters dictionary

Structs/TCJSONRequestEncoding.html.name: TCJSONRequestEncoding
Structs/TCJSONRequestEncoding.html.abstract: Provides the encoding method when making requests using model objects.

Protocols/TCJSONCodable.html#/s:6TCJSON1.name: init(fromData:)
Protocols/TCJSONCodable.html#/s:6TCJSON1.abstract: Initialize the model object from Data that represents it, using JSONDecoder.

Protocols/TCJSONCodable.html#/s:6TCJSON1.name: init(fromJSONString:)
Protocols/TCJSONCodable.html#/s:6TCJSON1.abstract: Initialize the model object from a String that represents it, using JSONDecoder after encoding the string in utf8.

Protocols/TCJSONCodable.html#/s:6TCJSON1.name: init(fromJSON:)
Protocols/TCJSONCodable.html#/s:6TCJSON1.abstract: Initialize the model object from a JSON object (like the dictionary method but compatible also with plain values), that represents it, using JSONDecoder after encoding the string in utf8.

Protocols/TCJSONCodable.html#/s:6TCJSON1.name: init(fromDictionary:)
Protocols/TCJSONCodable.html#/s:6TCJSON1.abstract: Initialize the model object from a [String: Any] dictionary that represents it, using JSONDecoder after encoding the dictionary as Data.

Protocols/TCJSONCodable.html#/s:6TCJSON1.name: af_encoded
Protocols/TCJSONCodable.html#/s:6TCJSON1.abstract: Returns the correct parameter dictionary for Alamofire and the corresponding encoding object.

Protocols/TCJSONCodable.html.name: TCJSONCodable
Protocols/TCJSONCodable.html.abstract: TCJSONCodable extends Codable and provides access to the correpsoding TCJSON object and two utility initializers: init(fromData:) and init(fromJSONString:)

Extensions/SessionManager.html#/s:9Alamo.name: request(_:method:tcjson:headers:)
Extensions/SessionManager.html#/s:9Alamo.abstract: Creates a DataRequest using the default SessionManager to retrieve the contents of the specified url,

Extensions/DataRequest.html#/s:9Alamofir.name: responseTCJSON(queue:options:completionHandler:)
Extensions/DataRequest.html#/s:9Alamofir.abstract: Adds a handler to be called once the request has finished. This handler receives directly a converted model object.
